apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices depicts a loving couple, a man with a medium-light skin tone embracing a person with a medium skin tone, a vibrant red heart floating between them, all rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients.  The realistic lighting highlights their connected posture and the soft rounded edges of their forms, emphasizing unity and affection.  On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully symbolizes romantic love, partnership, and deep emotional connection.
